subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Daniel Brière scored the only goal in a shootout and Ryan Miller stopped Carolina cold last night to give the visiting Buffalo Sabres a 3-2 victory over the Stanley Cup-champion Hurricanes.
snippet: Daniel Brière scored the only goal in a shootout and Ryan Miller stopped Carolina cold last night to give the visiting Buffalo Sabres a 3-2 victory over the Stanley Cup-champion Hurricanes.
